title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Contextualization Strategies in Science Learning—A VR-Based Inquiry Project

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Students can explain scientific concepts by connecting them to real-life examples
Develop the ability to design and implement scientific inquiry processes in VR environments
Analyze community issues scientifically and propose solutions

In service scenario-based role-playing, learners will clearly recognize their roles (e.g., guide, problem solver) and collaborate with 2 team members to perform a 3-stage problem-solving process (problem definition → solution discussion → action plan) with ≥80% accuracy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
